text: Bendekere is a village in Hassan district in Karnataka state, India. It is situated 5km away from sub-district headquarter Arsikere and 50km away from district headquarter Hassan. https://censusindia.gov.in/2011census/Listofvillagesandtowns.aspx ==References== Category:Villages in Hassan district [file:6 km from Arsikere. One of the very advanced village in India. People are well educated[over 80% by 2012].|250px|none|alt=|bendekere is in Hassan district
title: Bendekere
